title: Saying i will become inactive even though i am playing ranked games
body: Hi, I have been noticing in the past 3 days i have constantly been getting the inactivity message even though i play atleast 1 game a day. And i just played one 5 minutes ago and re-logged to see if it changed, and it did not. I don't know how to solve the problem or if it just a glitch.

replies.body: So the main issue you're most likely running into is basically that you're pretty good on every ranked queue xD! It looks like you're Plat in Flex SR and Flex TT, and Diamond in Solo SR. You've been getting that message because it's been almost a full month since you played in Flex TT, so that rank will begin to decay before too much longer. Make sure you hop in Flex TT before that happens!

I got the inactivity notification and lost some LP for my flex rank, but I just played (and won) a game, yet when I check my profile --> Ranked --> Flex 5v5 it says I'm still inactive and my LP will decay, help please?
